sub_fields.label: Button Type
sub_fields.name: button_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select the button type. Note: This will override the theme default. Slide buttons are defined by the slide settings in the "Font Size and Color" Tab

sub_fields.label: Button Colors
sub_fields.name: button_colors
sub_fields.instructions: Select the color settings for this button.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Select the background color for the button.

sub_fields.label: Border Color
sub_fields.name: border_color
sub_fields.instructions: Select the border color for the button.

sub_fields.label: Text Color
sub_fields.name: text_color
sub_fields.instructions: Select the text color for the button.

sub_fields.label: Background Color - hover
sub_fields.name: background_color_hover
sub_fields.instructions: Select the background color for the button on hover.

sub_fields.label: Border Color - Hover
sub_fields.name: border_color_hover
sub_fields.instructions: Select the border color for the button on hover.

sub_fields.label: Text Color - Hover
sub_fields.name: text_color_hover
sub_fields.instructions: Select the text color for the button on hover.
